Attributes.description: Planned collection, numeric and graphic summarization, and elementary statistical analysis of data. Examples primarily from health sciences illustrate standard techniques for parametric and non-parametric hypothesis testing; regression and correlation; contingency tables. Also randomization, "blindfolding" and other specifically biomedical topics in statistics. Class size may be limited.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: (Ability to use high school Algebra and simple graphs.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Start Time: Fri*, End Time: 9:30, Building: 12:30
